I wasted 24 hours downloading this SHIT to discover it.

"grain" isa film element you moron.  It's eithe rin the film or added as a post production effect to make it look "gritty".   Compression doesn't add grain and neither does downscaling.

Blocking or banding?  Sure.  But grain? NO.

along with this "true 720p" nonsense.  Black bars are black bars.   You either waste bandwidth on themor you don't.  There's no anamorphic blu-rays, so for disc there's no way around it.  But these are rips.  Stop being a retard.

V 10 
A 1

this track with out a doubt has the worst audio quality i have ever heard in a divx format and should be avoided entirely unless you are highly skilled at fixing this kind of thing, and because of the huge size this copy should be avoided.

This is a terrible torrent, avoid at all costs. Most 2GB 720p movies look and sound perfect. This is an 8GB movie and all you get is an upscaled-looking, EXTREMELY blocky, poorly compressed, unwatchable mess.

But yes, 1280x694 is 720p to the idiots who don't know what they're talking about.
